channel.title: Damn interfaces
channel.description:
ok i made an interface and it coems up with this when i compiler
[code]Class9.java:79: illegal start of expression public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: illegal start of expression public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: ';' expected public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: '.class' expected public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: ';' expected public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: <identifier> expected public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: not a statement public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: ';' expected public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:79: ';' expected public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName) ^ Class9.java:95: illegal start of expression public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: illegal start of expression public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: ';' expected public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: '.class' expected public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: ';' expected public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: <identifier> expected public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: not a statement public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: ';' expected public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s) ^ Class9.java:95: ';' expected public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s)
^ Class9.java:95: not a statement public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s)
^ Class9.java:95: ';' expected public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int heigh t, String s)
^ Class9.java:112: illegal start of expression public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: illegal start of expression public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: ';' expected public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: '.class' expected public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: ';' expected public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: <identifier> expected public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: not a statement public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: ';' expected public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName) ^ Class9.java:112: ';' expected public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName)
^ Class9.java:112: not a statement public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName)
^ Class9.java:112: ';' expected public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, Strin g spriteName)
^ Class9.java:128: illegal start of expression public static void starter(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { ^ Class9.java:128: illegal start of expression public static void starter(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { ^ Class9.java:128: ';' expected public static void starter(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { ^ Class9.java:128: '.class' expected public static void starter(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { ^ Class9.java:128: ';' expected public static void starter(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { ^ 36 errors Finished! AHHH help me plz
